data.message: Please, try to find a way for people to have their comments from a private group they were in that they left to be in their activity list on their own pages. Please, allow people to be able to change their names on Facebook. If someone changes careers it is impossible to change their names with the system that blocks them from doing so. Freedom means a person can delete comments and accounts and can have the name they choose.

replies.message: Thanks for the suggestions, Michelle. We’re listening to all the feedback we get from our awesome community. Have anymore suggestions? Let us know at: http://bit.ly/2ePsCs0. -Joe
